subtitle.id: Kami mematuhi standar tertinggi transparansi dan etika institusional.
subtitle.en: We strictly adhere to the highest standards of transparency and institutional ethics.

principles.description_id: Keterbukaan dalam mengemukakan informasi yang material dan relevan serta keterbukaan dalam melaksanakan proses pengambilan keputusan.
principles.description_en: Openness in disclosing material and relevant information and openness in implementing the decision-making process.

principles.description_id: Kejelasan fungsi, pelaksanaan dan pertanggungjawaban organ perusahaan sehingga pengelolaan perusahaan terlaksana secara efektif.
principles.description_en: Clarity of function, implementation and accountability of company organs so that company management is carried out effectively.

principles.description_id: Kesesuaian pengelolaan perusahaan terhadap peraturan perundang-undangan dan prinsip korporasi yang sehat.
principles.description_en: Compliance of company management with laws and regulations and sound corporate principles.

principles.description_id: Pengelolaan perusahaan secara profesional tanpa benturan kepentingan dan pengaruh/tekanan dari pihak manapun.
principles.description_en: Professional company management without conflicts of interest and influence/pressure from any party.

principles.description_id: Keadilan dan kesetaraan dalam memenuhi hak-hak stakeholder yang timbul berdasarkan perjanjian dan peraturan perundang-undangan.
principles.description_en: Justice and equality in fulfilling stakeholder rights arising from agreements and laws and regulations.

board_of_commissioners.bio_en: Corporate governance expert with 30+ years of experience in pharmaceutical and healthcare industry.

board_of_commissioners.name: Sarah Johnson, MBA
board_of_commissioners.bio_id: Ahli hukum korporasi internasional dengan spesialisasi dalam compliance dan regulatory affairs.
board_of_commissioners.bio_en: International corporate law expert specializing in compliance and regulatory affairs.

board_of_commissioners.name: Prof. Dr. Bambang Sutrisno
board_of_commissioners.bio_id: Akademisi dan praktisi di bidang manajemen risiko dan audit internal.
board_of_commissioners.bio_en: Academic and practitioner in risk management and internal audit.

board_of_commissioners.name: Ir. Suharto Wijaya
board_of_commissioners.bio_id: Berpengalaman dalam pengembangan bisnis dan strategi perusahaan di industri distribusi farmasi.
board_of_commissioners.bio_en: Experienced in business development and corporate strategy in pharmaceutical distribution industry.

committees.description_id: Membantu Dewan Komisaris dalam mengawasi proses pelaporan keuangan, sistem pengendalian internal, proses audit, dan kepatuhan terhadap peraturan.
committees.description_en: Assists the Board of Commissioners in overseeing financial reporting process, internal control systems, audit process, and regulatory compliance.

committees.description_id: Memberikan rekomendasi kepada Dewan Komisaris mengenai komposisi, kebijakan remunerasi, dan evaluasi kinerja Direksi.
committees.description_en: Provides recommendations to the Board of Commissioners regarding composition, remuneration policy, and performance evaluation of Directors.

committees.description_id: Mengidentifikasi, mengevaluasi, dan memantau implementasi manajemen risiko perusahaan secara menyeluruh.
committees.description_en: Identifies, evaluates, and monitors comprehensive implementation of company risk management.

committees.description_id: Memastikan implementasi prinsip-prinsip GCG dan memberikan rekomendasi perbaikan tata kelola perusahaan.
committees.description_en: Ensures implementation of GCG principles and provides recommendations for corporate governance improvement.

policies.description_id: Pedoman perilaku dan etika bisnis yang harus dipatuhi oleh seluruh jajaran perusahaan.
policies.description_en: Guidelines for business conduct and ethics that must be followed by all company personnel.

policies.description_id: Komitmen perusahaan untuk mencegah dan memberantas segala bentuk korupsi, suap, dan gratifikasi.
policies.description_en: Company commitment to prevent and eradicate all forms of corruption, bribery, and gratuities.

policies.description_id: Sistem pelaporan pelanggaran yang melindungi pelapor dan memastikan tindak lanjut yang tepat.
policies.description_en: Violation reporting system that protects whistleblowers and ensures proper follow-up.

policies.description_id: Framework pengelolaan risiko perusahaan secara komprehensif dan terintegrasi.
policies.description_en: Comprehensive and integrated corporate risk management framework.

policies.description_id: Pedoman untuk mengidentifikasi dan mengelola transaksi yang mengandung benturan kepentingan.
policies.description_en: Guidelines for identifying and managing transactions containing conflicts of interest.

policies.description_id: Aturan mengenai penerimaan dan pemberian hadiah, entertainment, dan fasilitas dalam konteks bisnis.
policies.description_en: Rules regarding acceptance and giving of gifts, entertainment, and facilities in business context.

policies.description_id: Perlindungan terhadap informasi rahasia perusahaan dan data pribadi stakeholder.
policies.description_en: Protection of company confidential information and stakeholder personal data.

policies.description_id: Pedoman komprehensif mengenai struktur, tugas, dan tanggung jawab organ perusahaan.
policies.description_en: Comprehensive guidelines on structure, duties, and responsibilities of company organs.

awards.title_en: Top 50 Public Companies in GCG Implementation
